Name: Hu Tao
Titles: Fragrance in Thaw, 77th-Generation Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Director Hu, Liyue Harbor's "Versemonger of the Darkest Alleys"
Intro: She is the 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor.
Introduction: Hu Tao is the 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, a person vital to managing Liyue's funerary affairs.She does her utmost to flawlessly carry out a person's last rites and preserve the world's balance of yin and yang.Aside from this, she is also a talented poet whose many "masterpieces" have passed around Liyue's populace by word of mouth.
Personality: The 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. She took over the business at a rather young age.
It would be best not underestimate someone as whimsical as her. However, should you enjoy surprises, then I believe a visit is in order.

At first glance, Hu Tao appears to be a quirky and cheerful girl. No one would think that she is actually the renowned director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor unless she tells them or they are working with her.

Hu Tao enjoys pranking people and despises sitting around and doing nothing, as she wishes to live her life to the fullest. Due to her eccentric and off the wall personality, many people who interact with Hu Tao are generally left a negative impression of her, especially Qiqi, who states that Hu Tao has a "punchable face" and should be stored in the fridge. On the contrary, Xiao likes her humor and finds it interesting.

Despite her negative impressions, she is also shown to be quite intelligent, being suspicious of Zhongli's true identity and knowing a fair amount about Liyue's hidden secrets and past. Despite always teasing him for being old-fashioned, Zhongli is also the friend and subordinate whom she trusts most.

She is quite secretive with sensitive information, as she refuses to disclose it claiming that the less outsiders know about it, the safer they are. She also takes pride in the parlor's storied history and her position as its current director, although she dislikes how others treat her and her employees with suspicion when they go out at night to work.

Hu Tao accepts death as a natural part of life; while this may make her appear callous to others, it helps her truly respect her job to help the dead "cross over". For this reason, Hu Tao viewed Qiqi's zombie state as unnatural and wished to bury the zombie so that she could pass on properly, and dislikes Baizhu after realizing that he is seeking out ways to prolong his life. She also appears to show a lack of interest in her Pyro Vision.
Appearance: Hu Tao has fair skin and scarlet eyes with flower-shaped pupils. She has long, dark brown hair fading to crimson at the tips, which she keeps parted into twin ponytails. She wears a dark brown porkpie hat decorated with red plum blossoms and branches, along with an indigo tassel and a wooden talisman attached to the front.

Hu Tao wears a traditional red shirt with a mandarin collar and black shorts with gold accents under a dark coat. Her Pyro Vision is embedded at the back of her coat, along with long rectangular coattails, a black collar and cuffs, and golden brooches attached underneath her coat's collar and waist. In addition, Hu Tao wears a pair of white socks with matching red blossoms along with low heeled dress shoes.

Skill_1.Name: Secret Spear of Wangsheng
Description: Normal Attack: Performs up to six consecutive spear strikes.
Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

Skill_2.Name: Guide to Afterlife
Description: Hu Tao consumes a part of her HP, knocking nearby enemies back and entering the Paramita Papilio State.

Increases Hu Tao's ATK based on her Max HP at the time of entering this state. ATK Bonus gained this way cannot exceed 400% of Hu Tao's Base ATK. Hu Tao's attack DMG is converted to Pyro DMG, which cannot be overridden by any other elemental infusion.Increases Hu Tao's resistance to interruption.Paramita Papilio ends when its duration is over, or when Hu Tao has left the battlefield or fallen.
In the Paramita Papilio state, Hu Tao's Charged Attacks apply the Blood Blossom effect to enemies it hits.

Enemies affected by Blood Blossom will take Pyro DMG every 4s.This DMG is considered Elemental Skill DMG.Each enemy can be affected by only one Blood Blossom effect at a time, and its duration may only be refreshed by Hu Tao herself.

Skill_3.Name: Spirit Soother
Description: Hu Tao commands a blazing spirit to deal Pyro DMG in a large AoE. Upon striking the enemy, regenerates a percentage of Hu Tao's Max HP. This effect can be triggered up to 5 times based on the number of enemies hit.
If Hu Tao's HP is below or equal to 50% when the enemy is hit, both the DMG and HP Regeneration are increased.

Skill_4.Name: Flutter By
Description: When a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife ends, all allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 8s.

Skill_5.Name: Sanguine Rouge
Description: When Hu Tao's HP is equal to or less than 50%, her Pyro DMG Bonus is increased by 33%.

Skill_6.Name: The More the Merrier
Description: When Hu Tao cooks a dish perfectly, she has a 18% chance to receive an additional "Suspicious" dish of the same type.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Crimson Bouquet
Details: While in a Paramita Papilio state activated by Guide to Afterlife, Hu Tao's Charge Attacks do not consume Stamina.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Ominous Rainfall
Details: Increases the Blood Blossom DMG by an amount equal to 10% of Hu Tao's Max HP at the time the effect is applied.Additionally, Spirit Soother will also apply the Blood Blossom effect.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Lingering Carmine
Details: Increases the Level of Guide to Afterlife by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Garden of Eternal Rest
Details: Upon defeating an enemy affected by a Blood Blossom that Hu Tao applied herself, all nearby allies in the party (excluding Hu Tao herself) will have their CRIT Rate increased by 12% for 15s.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Floral Incense
Details: Increases the Level of Spirit Soother by 3.Maximum upgrade level is 15.

ConstellationDetails.Name: Butterfly's Embrace
Details: Triggers when Hu Tao's HP drops below 25%, or when she suffers a lethal strike:Hu Tao will not fall as a result of the DMG sustained. Additionally, for the next 10s, all of her Elemental and Physical RES is increased by 200%, her CRIT Rate is increased by 100%, and her resistance to interruption is greatly increased.This effect triggers automatically when Hu Tao has 1 HP left.Can only occur once every 60s.

ElementalBrust.HitCount: Low HP Regeneration (% of Max HP)
